oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Alberta Survey, 1997
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Population Research Laboratory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The 1997 Alberta Survey (AS) was the tenth annual provincial survey administered by the Population Research Laboratory (PRL). This omnibus style survey of households in the province of Alberta has enabled academic researchers, government departments, non profit organizations, and the pri vate sector to explore a wide range of research topics in a structured research framework.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Arts and Humanities
